alert.note: Alert for Adams; Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 5:24PM MDT until July 09 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN VALLEY AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 521 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northwest of Donnelly, moving east-northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Little Payette Lake and Payette Lake around 530 PM MDT. Lake Fork Guard Station and Paddy Flat Work Center around 540 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
